initiated_appraisals_template_check.name: initiated_appraisals_template_check
initiated_appraisals_template_check.value: ("initiated_appraisals"."appraisal_type" NOT IN ('questionnaire_based', 'mbo_based')) OR (array_length("initiated_appraisals"."questionnaire_template_ids", 1) > 0 OR "initiated_appraisals"."document_url" IS NOT NULL)
